statements: SELECT id, sensitive_data, encryption_key, encryption_date, last_updated FROM data_encryption;
SELECT sensitive_data, id, encryption_date, encryption_key, last_updated FROM data_encryption;
SELECT encryption_date, sensitive_data, id, last_updated, encryption_key FROM data_encryption;
SELECT id, sensitive_data FROM data_encryption;
SELECT id, encryption_date, sensitive_data FROM data_encryption;
SELECT * FROM data_encryption WHERE id = 1;
SELECT sensitive_data, encryption_date FROM data_encryption WHERE last_updated > '2021-01-01';
SELECT id, sensitive_data FROM data_encryption WHERE encryption_key LIKE 'AB%' ORDER BY encryption_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_encryption WHERE last_updated BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT id, encryption_date FROM data_encryption WHERE sensitive_data IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id ASC, encryption_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data;
SELECT data, timestamp FROM sensitive_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT data FROM sensitive_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT encrypted_data, encryption_status FROM sensitive_data JOIN encryption_logs ON sensitive_data.id = encryption_logs.data_id WHERE encryption_status = 'SUCCESS';
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE data LIKE '%credit card%';
SELECT id, data, timestamp FROM sensitive_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT data, encrypted_data FROM sensitive_data WHERE id = 3;
SELECT data_id, encryption_status FROM encryption_logs WHERE encryption_date >= '2022-01-01' AND encryption_status = 'success' ORDER BY encryption_date ASC;
SELECT MAX(id) AS max_id FROM sensitive_data;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data;
SELECT name, ssn, id FROM sensitive_data ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE id = 5;
SELECT ssn, name FROM sensitive_data WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM sensitive_data;
SELECT id, name, ssn FROM sensitive_data WHERE ssn = '12345678901';
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM sensitive_data WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, ssn FROM sensitive_data WHERE id % 2 = 0;
SELECT id, ssn FROM sensitive_data WHERE id BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM EncryptedData;
SELECT id, sensitive_data FROM EncryptedData ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM EncryptionLogs WHERE encryption_status = 'SUCCESS';
SELECT policy_id, compliance_level FROM EnforcementPolicies WHERE data_type = 'Personal';
SELECT report_id, report_text FROM ComplianceReports ORDER BY report_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM EncryptedData WHERE id = 1;
SELECT sensitive_data, encryption_key FROM EncryptedData WHERE id = 2;
SELECT log_id, encryption_status, encryption_timestamp FROM EncryptionLogs ORDER BY encryption_timestamp DESC;
SELECT policy_id, data_type, compliance_level FROM EnforcementPolicies WHERE compliance_level = 'High';
SELECT report_id, report_text, report_timestamp FROM ComplianceReports WHERE report_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data;
SELECT id, data FROM sensitive_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_value = 'abc123';
SELECT action, date_time FROM encryption_logs WHERE log_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, permission FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT data FROM sensitive_data WHERE id > 10 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, data FROM sensitive_data JOIN encryption_logs ON sensitive_data.id = encryption_logs.log_id WHERE action = 'encryption';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_encryption_logs, date_time FROM encryption_logs GROUP BY date_time ORDER BY total_encryption_logs DESC;
SELECT user_id, permission FROM user_permissions WHERE permission LIKE '%admin%' AND user_id IN (SELECT id FROM sensitive_data);
